Package org.lwjgl.bullet

Class B3LinkState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3LinkState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3LinkState
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3LinkState {
     double m_worldPosition[3];
     double m_worldOrientation[4];
     double m_localInertialPosition[3];
     double m_localInertialOrientation[4];
     double m_worldLinkFramePosition[3];
     double m_worldLinkFrameOrientation[4];
     double m_worldLinearVelocity[3];
     double m_worldAngularVelocity[3];
     double m_worldAABBMin[3];
     double m_worldAABBMax[3];
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3LinkState

        public B3LinkState​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3LinkState instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

        public static B3LinkState callocStack()

        Returns a new B3LinkState instance allocated on the specified MemoryStack.
        Parameters:
        stack - the stack from which to allocate

      • callocStack

        public static B3LinkState callocStack​(MemoryStack stack)
        Returns a new B3LinkState instance allocated on the specified MemoryStack and initializes all its bits to zero.
        Parameters:
        stack - the stack from which to allocate
